title: Samsung Galaxy Watch codename hints at upcoming ‘Pro’ model
content:
According to a new report, Samsung could add a new ‘Pro’ variant in its upcoming Galaxy Watch lineup. Last year, Samsung launched two variants in the Galaxy Watch 4 series.  This year, the company could add a new model to the mix, giving consumers a more premium option. Sources familiar with Samsung’s plans have revealed

The post Samsung Galaxy Watch codename hints at upcoming ‘Pro’ model appeared first on XDA.
description: Samsung could introduce a third option in its upcoming Galaxy Watch lineup. This new model could be labeled as the Galaxy Watch 5 Pro.
